CustomField.description: This student is in high school, and I wish to deny the release of Directory Information as follows

value.fullName: Do not release this information to any agencies, organizations, or third parties EXCEPT the military

value.fullName: Do not release this information to any agencies, organizations, or third parties INCLUDING the military.
